item.title: My first lightmap baker: Bakery
item.description: A simple Sponza Palace baked by my first lightmap baker. Only one directional light and Skylight(ambient light) setup in the scene. Looking pretty rough. And the lightmap of the whole scene above. It has an information of both direct light and indirect light colour. It’s been a couple of years. Since I started making my own lightmap baker. And before I start this article, I finished this project.
